intro: Stenostomum abbreviatum, commonly known as the narrow-mouthed geranium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Geraniaceae family and is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and showy, five-petaled flowers. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky areas. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Stenostomum abbreviatum is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and adaptability to various soil types.
